name: div
features: Prevent Bat Sting: Protect your hand from getting jammed
Fit Your Hand: Comfortably stays in place
Avoid Death Grip: Unlock your optimal swing
Fits Left or Right Handed Batters
Sizing: Small: 2-1/4" Circumference (Under 115 lbs) Medium: 2-1/2" Circumference (115-195 lbs) Large: 2-3/4" Circumference (195 lbs & Up)
